summary: This bill, the FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act, mandates a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) between the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) and the Small Business Administration (SBA). The MOU aims to disseminate information to reporting companies (businesses) regarding beneficial ownership reporting requirements under 31 U.S.C. §5336.  It addresses issues related to money laundering and illicit financial activities, requiring coordinated outreach, public education, and reporting on compliance. The bill directs meetings, public availability of the MOU and periodic reports to relevant congressional committees.
